name: proxy_hero
keywords: v2ray vmess vless trojan shadowsocks socks tor

AA.description: Beginner users only need to modify the following AUUID and click the Deploy app button at the end of the page to start deployment
AA.value: If there is an error, please check the parameter format or try several times. When using a custom parameter, be sure to fully understand its meaning first

AUUID.description: UUID serves as the path and account password for each configuration. It is recommended to modify and save it properly. UUID-generating website: https://www.uuidgenerator.net

CADDYIndexPage.description: After the custom CADDY is deployed, click on the display page of View, refer to: https://github.com/shypewang/proxy_hero/blob/main/etc/CADDYIndexPage.md

CONFIGCADDY.description: Customize the network address to read the configuration and run CADDY, please do not modify if you are not familiar with the CADDY configuration

CONFIGV2RAY.description: Customize the network address to read the configuration and run V2RAY, please do not modify if you are not familiar with the V2RAY configuration

ParameterSSENCYPT.description: SS encryption method, check the support agreement: https://www.v2fly.org/config/protocols/shadowsocks.html

StoreFiles.description: Customize the network address to read the stored file list
